title: Goal-Based Project Learning for Strengthening Digital Literacy in Control Science

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental control systems theory and industrial field experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education for current practitioners, conducted in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Achieve at least 68% competency improvement in the five DIGCOMP 2.2 domains (information & data literacy, digital content creation, digital security, problem-solving, and digital collaboration)
Complete at least two practical problem-solving projects using a quadruple mentoring system (digital literacy, academic, project, corporate)
Improve technical problem-solving skills by at least 55% through formative assessments and bridge the gap between theory and practice
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
